alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:14PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 500 PM MST... At 414 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Superstition Mountains, or 8 miles north of Gold Canyon, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Goldfield Ranch, Kings Ranch, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area, Gold Camp, Fort McDowell and Tortilla Flat. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 192 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River
